alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Greene; Washington; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 27 at 2:02PM EST until November 27 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EST FOR SOUTHERN WASHINGTON...SOUTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND...GREENE... NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...NORTHWESTERN MONONGALIA...OHIO...NORTHEASTERN WETZEL AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 201 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Triadelphia to 8 miles north of Pine Grove, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Waynesburg, California, Monongahela, Bentleyville, Fredericktown-Millsboro, Jefferson Boro, Cameron, Hundred, New Eagle, Wickerham Manor-Fisher, Baidland, and North Charleroi. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
